title: Kylie Jenner and ex Travis Scott are 'STILL living together and plan to spend holidays as family'
text:
Kylie Jenner is reportedly still living with her ex-beau Travis Scott as he continues to rest up after his knee injury.

TMZ report that the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, 22, and her rapper ex, 28, are 'getting comfortable' at the Calabasas home they shared, where they have been cohabiting with their beloved daughter Stormi, 20 months.

The news comes after it was revealed that friends of the former couple, who announced their split earlier this month, are convinced the duo will reunite 'by the end of the year'.

Happier times: Kylie Jenner is reportedly still living with her ex-beau Travis Scott as he continues to rest up after his knee injury (pictured in August)

On Wednesday, Kylie shared photos with Stormi at a pumpkin patch, with it later being revealed later on that Travis was joining them on the outing after suffering a nasty fall at the Rolling Loud Music Festival in Queens, New York on Sunday.

It appeared to be the first time the make-up mogul and the rapper were face-to-face since August 27 however TMZ now claim that they are in fact living together.

The site explained: 'Kylie and Travis are getting very comfortable together since their split, and he's been spending lots of time at her house...

'Travis is spending nights at the home he and Kylie shared in Beverly Hills.'

Hanging out: TMZ report that the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, 22, and her rapper ex, 28, are 'getting comfortable' at the Calabasas home they shared, where they have been hanging out with their beloved daughter Stormi, 20 months

Adding further to their friendly family vibe, the duo plan on spending both Thanksgiving and Christmas as a couple.

It comes following reports that Kylie's family are keen for her and Travis to rekindle their two year romance, with a source stating they respect him as a partner and father to their daughter.

It was reported on Tuesday that Kylie's family are keen for them to reunite, with a source saying: 'Her family wants them to be together. Travis might not be perfect, but he's a great partner and dad.

Sweet: The news comes after it was revealed that the former couple, who announced their split earlier this month, took the tot to a pumpkin patch in what was considered their first public meet-up in seven months

'Everyone would be upset if Kylie can't figure things out with Travis.'

Following their split, Kylie and Travis have continued to co-parent Stormi, 20 months.

Meanwhile, it was claimed that part of the reason Travis and Kylie decided to call off their romance was over differing views on whether or not to expand their family.
description: TMZ report that the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, 22, and her rapper ex, 28, are 'getting comfortable' at the Calabasas home they shared'
